_notes: This is an example MotD file, intended to explain how to write your own.
options: A top-level 'options' array can be selected from on any non-holiday.
These options can only be selected on the 14th day of a month.
You can use any number from 1 to 31.
These options can only be selected on a Wednesday.
You can use any three-letter weekday abbreviation, case-insensitive.
These options can only be selected in the second week of any month.
You can use week-1 through week-5, case-insensitive.
These options can only be selected from in the month of January.
You can use any three-letter month abbreviation, case-insensitive.
You can nest these qualifiers infinitely deep, in any order.
These options will only be selected on Wednesday in February.
The holiday tag can be used to exclude any more general MotDs on specific dates.
These options, and only these options, will be selected on February 14th, Valentine's Day.
